issue.title: [CF 475] Meta icon timer doesn't always show
issue.body:
What steps will reproduce the problem?
1. Set up buff/debuff icon for Nature's Grace.
2. Set up internal cooldown icon for Nature's Grace.
3. Create Meta icon to include the 2 above with Priority = Normally and the same order as above.

What do you expect to happen? What happens instead?
To see timer every time. It works first time after reload UI then quits working.

What version of TellMeWhen are you using? ("The latest" is not a version)
5.0.2

Do you have an error log of what happened?
no

Please provide any additional information below (including any export strings if applicable; see above.)

Nature's Grace buff/debuff:
^1^T^SShowTimer^B ^SEvents^T ^N1^T ^SType^SAnimations ^SAnimation^SACTVTNGLOW ^SEvent^SOnStart ^t^Sn^N1 ^t^SType^Sbuff ^SName^S16886 ^SFakeHidden^B ^SEnabled^B ^t^N50202^S~`~| ^Sicon^^

Nature's Grace internal cooldown:
^1^T^SShowWhen^Salways ^SType^Sicd ^SShowTimerText^B ^SFakeHidden^B ^SEnabled^B ^SName^S16886:~`60 ^t^N50202^S~`~| ^Sicon^^

Nature's Grace Meta icon:
^1^T^SType^Smeta ^SEnabled^B ^SIcons^T ^N1^STellMeWhen_Group3_Icon4 ^N2^STellMeWhen_Group3_Icon3 ^t^t^N50202^S~`~| ^Sicon^^


> Posted by CurseForge user nlvyper | Imported from CurseForge issue #475 | Raw

comments.body:
Should be fixed in r501


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
